import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class LunchroomModalComponent extends Component { menu={ id_menu:1, id_lunchroom:"asdnkjh13u4982u3", date:"20/10/18", soup:"changua", appetizer:"lenteja", main_course:"arroz", protein:"pollo", juice:"maracuya", dessert:"piazza", salad:"ensalada de frutas" } info={ price:5000, line:20, time:10 } constructor( props ){ super( props ); this.state = { currentTime:this.info.line } } tick(){ this.setState(( prevState, props ) => ({ currentTime: prevState.currentTime - 1 })); } componentDidMount(){ this.timerID = setInterval( () => this.tick(), 60000 ); } render() { return (

{this.props.name}

Menú

Sopa {this.menu.soup}
Principio {this.menu.appetizer}
Seco {this.menu.main_course}
Proteina {this.menu.protein}
Jugo {this.menu.juice}
Postre {this.menu.dessert}
Ensalada {this.menu.salad}

Información

Precio {this.info.price} pesos
Turnos restantes {this.info.line}
Tiempo de espera {this.state.currentTime>=0 ? this.state.currentTime : 0} {this.state.currentTime===1 ? " minuto" : " minutos"}
); } } export default LunchroomModalComponent;
